text: 4.4: Ro 6.19; 1 Ko 6.13-15; 6.18Nde won ndavi vheri khavi vuzvugi mbatɨgi, nde nta ganɨri, nta nde ganɨ thari. Nde nta ganɨv, nde Fhe Bakɨme vuzvugi tɨvir muuŋv, nde ana nɨman ŋgaravra kɨv, nde vhɨra harigi gumgi nɨman nzerara kɨri. 4.4 Kha ŋanen mbe Grikar kaman suaŋgi kameŋ tuituigiap hɨgi fhuvara.
